TopicTitle: Going to Laythe and back with only solid fuel and no parachutes

Articles.Content:
This was my ubmission to the recent reddit challenge to land on the Mun with only SRBs. I took it further and visit Laythe and return to Kerbin using only solid fuel and without parachutes! Hopefully you can appreciate the days and days of thrust limiting and fuel balancing needed to get this to work... ;P

Enjoy! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aKa5T0EZRxY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
